title: SUGGESTION: favorite champion list?
body:
This is a minor issue I been having for a while. I do have 100+ champions, so when come to choosing a champion, I sometimes get confused or overlooked some champions I want to play just because I am not scrolling the champion list all the way down. So can we add a favorite champion list to add our favorite champions to a special filter for better choosing and decision making during the short window given in champion select?

PS. Dota 2 has this feature, I don't see the reason we can't have that in LOL.

replies.body:
Whenever i go into norms i think

"FUUUCK, what to play...?"
"Wish i had more than 30 champs."

Oh, and ty Musterpulse.
